content:
760 days of a large -scale war. More than two years of the obvious reality that the world's world is bearing. Ruins instead of cities and villages. Pain and death instead of life. Terror instead of international law.

About thiswrotePresident of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

“Ukrainians bravely defend their country and protect. I am grateful to everyone in the world who helps our country and the people. I thank everyone who fundamentally calls things by their names and does not allow Russia to deceive the world by propaganda and conquer blackmail, ”the head of state emphasized.

According to the President, Russia must lose in this war.

"It can only protect life reliably," Volodymyr Zelenskyy is sure.

"Air defense, long -range weapons, artillery, sanctions, confiscation of Russian assets, support of our country - all this brings the restoration of honest peace and normal life," the President of Ukraine summarizes.

As reportedArmyinform, The forces of defense have shot two Russian large landing ships.
title: President of Ukraine: Russia must lose in this war. It can only reliably protect life

author: Army Inform
